column5: [Printed book page 869,2]  rasa   m. (ifc. f(A). ) the sap or juice of plants, <!!!>Juice of fruit<!!!>, any liquid or fluid, the best or finest or prime part of anything, essence,
[ID=240011]    sahas   n. strength, power, force, victory (sahasas putra or <!!!>°sah sUnu<!!!> m. ‘son of strength’, N. of Agni in RV. ; sahasA ind. See below; sahoBiH ind.
